    <script type="text/JavaScript">
        newwinFeatures = "menubar=no,location=no,toolbar=no,status=no,resizable=yes,scrollbars=yes,width=700,height=480,top=" + (screen.height - 480) / 2 + ",left=" + (screen.width - 700) / 2;

        function InitPage() {
            body.style.cursor = "";
            if (document.getElementById("HidBackFlag").value == "BackFromAMApplyTranByStages") {
                showAllSelectApply();
                SetTransByStageCheckBoxAndAction();
            }
        }
        var LIMIT_ERROR_MSG = "您选择的分期申请金额不能低于￥";

        function GetCheckBoxInElement(parent, cbxChkAllID) {
            if (parent == null || parent == undefined)
            {
                return null;
            }
            for (var i = 0; i < parent.childNodes.length; i++) {
                var e = parent.childNodes[i];
                if (e.type == 'checkbox' && e.id != cbxChkAllID) {
                    return e;
                }
            }
            return null;
        }

        function DisabledReckoningRows(dgReckoning, cbxChkAllID, iCount, isDisabled) {
            for (var i = 1; i <= iCount; i++) {
                var e = GetCheckBoxInElement(dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[7], cbxChkAllID);
                if (e != null) {
                    e.disabled = isDisabled;
                }
            }
        }

        //首先全部Disabel分期申请
        function InitTransByStageAction() {
            body.style.cursor = "";
            DisabledReckoningRows(document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail"), "cbxChkAll", document.getElementById("HidCount").value, true);
            DisabledReckoningRows(document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail_Unbilled"), "cbxChkAll_Unbilled", document.getElementById("HidCount_Unbilled").value, true);

            if (document.getElementById("tbSubmit") != null) {
                document.getElementById("BtnSet").disabled = true;
                document.getElementById("trMsg").style.display = "none";
            }

            if (document.getElementById("tbSubmit_Unbilled") != null) {
                document.getElementById("btnSet_Unbilled").disabled = true;
                document.getElementById("trMsg_Unbilled").style.display = "none";
            }
        }


        //最大分期金额获取后进行设置，是否可分期
        function SetTransByStageCheckBoxAndAction() {
            body.style.cursor = "";
            if (document.getElementById("HidAccType").value == "personal") {
                showAllUseApply();
            }
            if (document.getElementById("HidBackFlag").value == "BackFromAMApplyTranByStages") {
                showAllSelectApply();
            }

            if (document.getElementById("tbSubmit") != null) {
                document.getElementById("BtnSet").disabled = false;
                document.getElementById("trMsg").style.display = "none";
            }

            if (document.getElementById("tbSubmit_Unbilled") != null && document.getElementById("tbSubmit_Unbilled").style.display != "none") {
                document.getElementById("btnSet_Unbilled").disabled = false;
                document.getElementById("trMsg_Unbilled").style.display = "none";
            }

        }
        function GoToFastPayment() {
            var CreditAccNo = 'CreditAccNo=' + document.getElementById("hdfCreditAccSelected").value;
            CallFuncEx3('rm_FastPayment$$220002', 'C', 'CBANK_CREDITCARD_REPAYMENT', 'Repayment/rm_FastPayment.aspx', 'FORM', null, CreditAccNo);
        }
        function SubmitNext(type) {
            dialogFeatures = "dialogHeight: 650px; dialogWidth: 800px; edge: Raised; center: Yes; help: No; resizable: No; status: No;";
            if (window.event)
                window.event.returnValue = false;
            var j = 0;
            var iCount;
            var dgReckoning;
            var cbxChkAllID;
            document.getElementById("HidList").value = "";
            if (type == "Unbilled") {
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount_Unbilled").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail_Unbilled");
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll_Unbilled";
            }
            else {
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail");
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll";
            }


            for (var i = 1; i <= iCount; i++) {
                var e = GetCheckBoxInElement(dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[7], cbxChkAllID);
                if (e != null && e.checked) {
                    document.getElementById("HidList").value += dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[9].innerHTML + "|";
                    j++;
                }
            }
            if (j == 0) {
                alert("您还没有选择要进行分期的交易，请选择！");
                return false;
            }
            if (window.event)
                window.event.returnValue = true;
            P.process();
            return true;
        }

        function showAllSelectApply() {
            var strList = document.getElementById("HidTranCodeList").value;
            var iCount = 0;
            var appByStagesType = document.getElementById("hidAppByStagesType").value
            var dgReckoning;
            var cbxChkAllID;
            if (appByStagesType == "Unbilled") {
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount_Unbilled").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail_Unbilled");
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll_Unbilled";
            }
            else {
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail");
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll";
            }
            CheckSelectReckoningRows(dgReckoning, cbxChkAllID, iCount, strList);

        }
        function CheckSelectReckoningRows(dgReckoning, cbxChkAllID, iCount, strList) {
            for (var i = 1; i <= iCount; i++) {
                var sTranCode = dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[9].innerHTML;
                var e = GetCheckBoxInElement(dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[7], cbxChkAllID);
                if (e != null) {
                    if (strList.indexOf(sTranCode) >= 0) {
                        e.checked = true;
                    } else {
                        e.checked = false;
                    }
                }
            }
        }


        function CheckReckoningRows(dgReckoning, cbxChkAllID, iCount) {
            for (var i = 1; i <= iCount; i++) {
                var e = GetCheckBoxInElement(dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[7], cbxChkAllID);
                if (e != null) {
                    var staus = dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[8].innerHTML.toString();
                    if (staus == "0") {
                        e.disabled = false;
                    } else {
                        e.disabled = true;
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        function SetDisplayReckoningRows(dgReckoning, iCount, display) {
            for (var i = 0; i <= iCount; i++) {
                var e = dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[7];
                e.style.display = display;
            }
        }

        function showAllUseApply() {
            CheckReckoningRows(document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail"), "cbxChkAll", document.getElementById("HidCount").value);
            CheckReckoningRows(document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail_Unbilled"), "cbxChkAll_Unbilled", document.getElementById("HidCount_Unbilled").value);
        }

        function hideAllUseApply() {
            SetDisplayReckoningRows(document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail"), document.getElementById("HidCount").value, "none");
            SetDisplayReckoningRows(document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail_Unbilled"), document.getElementById("HidCount_Unbilled").value, "none");
        }

        function QueryReckoningUSD() {
            triggerFunc("am_QueryReckoningNotUSD.aspx", "FORM", "_self", 'ByStageFlag=' + document.getElementById("HidByStageFlag").value);
        }


        function changeSub(idx) {
            switch (idx) {
                case 0:
                    var param1 = 'index=0';
                    CallFuncEx3('Cver2_am_QueryAccount$$215005', 'C', 'CBANK_CREDITCARD_ACCOUNT', 'Account/am_QueryAccount.aspx', 'FORM', null, param1);
                    break;
                case 1:
                    var param1 = 'index=1';
                    triggerFunc("am_QueryReckoningSurveyNew.aspx", "FORM", "_self", param1);
                    break;
                case 2:
                    var param1 = 'index=2';
                    triggerFunc("am_QueryReckoningNotRMB.aspx", "FORM", "_self", param1);
                    break;
            }
        }
        function QueryNextDeLayReckoningRMB() {
            var param1 = 'CreditAccNo=' + document.getElementById("hdfCreditAccSelected").value;
            triggerFunc('../am_QueryNextDeLayReckoningRMB.aspx', 'FORM', 'DeLayReckoningQuery', param1);

            if (window.event)
                window.event.returnValue = false;
        }



        function CheckAll(cbxObj, type) {
            DisCheckedAll(type);
            var checked = cbxObj.checked;
            var iRtnCount = 0;
            var iRtnAmount = 0;
            document.getElementById("HidList").value = "";
            var iCount = 0;
            var strLeftStageAMT;
            var strMinStageAMT =  getUseAMT(document.getElementById("hdfMinStageAMT").value);
            var dgReckoning;
            var tbSubmit;
            var BtnSet;
            var trMsg;
            var CheckedCount;
            var ApplyStageAMT;
            var LeftStageAMT;
            var cbxChkAllID;
            
            if (type == "Unbilled") {
                strLeftStageAMT = getUseAMT(document.getElementById("HidLeftStageAMT_Unbilled").value);
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount_Unbilled").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail_Unbilled");
                tbSubmit = document.getElementById("tbSubmit_Unbilled");
                BtnSet = document.getElementById("btnSet_Unbilled");
                trMsg = document.getElementById("trMsg_Unbilled");
                CheckedCount = document.getElementById("CheckedCount_Unbilled");
                ApplyStageAMT = document.getElementById("ApplyStageAMT_Unbilled");
                LeftStageAMT = document.getElementById("LeftStageAMT_Unbilled");
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll_Unbilled";
            }
            else {
                strLeftStageAMT = getUseAMT(document.getElementById("HidLeftStageAMT").value);
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail");
                tbSubmit = document.getElementById("tbSubmit");
                BtnSet = document.getElementById("BtnSet");
                trMsg = document.getElementById("trMsg");
                CheckedCount = document.getElementById("CheckedCount");
                ApplyStageAMT = document.getElementById("ApplyStageAMT");
                LeftStageAMT = document.getElementById("LeftStageAMT");
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll";
            }


            if (strLeftStageAMT < 0) {
                strLeftStageAMT = 0;
            }
            for (var i = 1; i <= iCount; i++) {
                var e = GetCheckBoxInElement(dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[7], cbxChkAllID);
                if (e != null && e.disabled == false) {
                    if (checked) {
                        e.checked = true;
                        iRtnCount++;
                        if (iRtnCount > 20) {
                            iRtnCount--;
                            e.checked = false;
                            break;
                        }
                        var sAmount = dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[5].innerHTML;
                        sAmount = getUseAMT(sAmount);
                        iRtnAmount += parseFloat(sAmount);
                        if (iRtnAmount > parseFloat(strLeftStageAMT)) {
                            iRtnCount--;
                            e.checked = false;
                            iRtnAmount = iRtnAmount - parseFloat(sAmount);
                            strLeftStageAMT = GetStdDispalyMoney(GetDisplayAmt(strLeftStageAMT));
                            alert("您的最大可分期金额为￥" + strLeftStageAMT + "元，您目前累计申请分期的总金额已超出，请重新申请。");
                            break;
                        }
                        document.getElementById("HidList").value += dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[9].innerHTML + "|";
                    } else {
                        e.checked = false;
                    }
                }
            }
            if (tbSubmit != null) {
                if (parseFloat(iRtnAmount.toFixed(2)) < parseFloat(strMinStageAMT)) {
                    BtnSet.disabled = true;
                    trMsg.innerHTML = LIMIT_ERROR_MSG + $("#hdfMinStageAMT").val() + "元";
                    trMsg.style.display = "";
                } else {
                    BtnSet.disabled = false;
                    trMsg.style.display = "none";
                }
            }
            if (CheckedCount != null)
                CheckedCount.innerHTML = iRtnCount;
            if (ApplyStageAMT != null)
                ApplyStageAMT.innerHTML = GetStdDispalyMoney(GetDisplayAmt(iRtnAmount.toFixed(2)));
            if (LeftStageAMT != null)
                LeftStageAMT.innerHTML = GetStdDispalyMoney(GetDisplayAmt((strLeftStageAMT - iRtnAmount).toFixed(2)));
        }

        function DisCheckedAll(type) {
            var iCount = 0;
            var dgReckoning;
            var cbxChkAllID;
            if (type == "Unbilled") {
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount_Unbilled").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail_Unbilled");
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll_Unbilled";
            }
            else {
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail");
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll";
            }
            for (var i = 1; i <= iCount; i++) {
                var e = GetCheckBoxInElement(dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[7], cbxChkAllID);
                if (e != null && e.disabled == false) {
                    e.checked = false;
                }
            }
        }

        function getUseAMT(strAMT) {
            strAMT = strAMT.toString();
            if (strAMT.substring(0, 1) == "￥") {
                strAMT = Trim(strAMT.substring(1));
            }
            strs = strAMT.split(",");
            var strRTAMT = "";
            for (i = 0; i < strs.length; i++) {
                strRTAMT += strs[i].toString();
            }
            return strRTAMT;
        }

        function CheckStage(cbxObj, type) {
            var iRtnCount = 0;
            var iRtnAmount = 0;
            document.getElementById("HidList").value = "";

            var iCount = 0;
            var strLeftStageAMT;
            var strMinStageAMT = getUseAMT(document.getElementById("hdfMinStageAMT").value);
            var dgReckoning;
            //var tbStage;
            var tbSubmit;
            var BtnSet;
            var trMsg;
            var CheckedCount;
            var ApplyStageAMT;
            var LeftStageAMT;
            var cbxChkAllID;

            if (type == "Unbilled") {
                strLeftStageAMT = getUseAMT(document.getElementById("HidLeftStageAMT_Unbilled").value);
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount_Unbilled").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail_Unbilled");
                tbSubmit = document.getElementById("tbSubmit_Unbilled");
                BtnSet = document.getElementById("btnSet_Unbilled");
                trMsg = document.getElementById("trMsg_Unbilled");
                CheckedCount = document.getElementById("CheckedCount_Unbilled");
                ApplyStageAMT = document.getElementById("ApplyStageAMT_Unbilled");
                LeftStageAMT = document.getElementById("LeftStageAMT_Unbilled");
                document.getElementById("cbxChkAll_Unbilled").checked = false;
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll_Unbilled";
            }
            else {
                strLeftStageAMT = getUseAMT(document.getElementById("HidLeftStageAMT").value);
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail");
                tbSubmit = document.getElementById("tbSubmit");
                BtnSet = document.getElementById("BtnSet");
                trMsg = document.getElementById("trMsg");
                CheckedCount = document.getElementById("CheckedCount");
                ApplyStageAMT = document.getElementById("ApplyStageAMT");
                LeftStageAMT = document.getElementById("LeftStageAMT");
                document.getElementById("cbxChkAll").checked = false;
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll";
            }

            if (strLeftStageAMT < 0) {
                strLeftStageAMT = 0;
            }
            for (var i = 1; i <= iCount; i++) {
                var e = GetCheckBoxInElement(dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[7], cbxChkAllID);
                if (e != null && e.checked) {
                    var sAmount = dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[5].innerHTML;
                    sAmount = getUseAMT(sAmount);
                    iRtnAmount += parseFloat(sAmount);
                    iRtnCount++;
                    if (iRtnAmount > parseFloat(strLeftStageAMT)) {
                        try {
                            var j = GetDelCheckBoxId(cbxObj.id, type);
                            GetCheckBoxInElement(dgReckoning.rows[j].cells[7], cbxChkAllID).checked = false;                            
                        }
                        catch (e) { }
                        strLeftStageAMT = GetStdDispalyMoney(GetDisplayAmt(strLeftStageAMT));
                        alert("您的累计申请交易分期的总金额已经超过了最大可分期金额￥" + strLeftStageAMT + "元，请重新选择。");
                        break;
                    }
                    if (iRtnCount > 20) {
                        try {
                            var j = GetDelCheckBoxId(cbxObj.id, type);
                            GetCheckBoxInElement(dgReckoning.rows[j].cells[7], cbxChkAllID).checked = false;                          
                        }
                        catch (e) { }
                        alert("交易分期一次最多只能申请20笔！");
                        break;
                    }
                    document.getElementById("HidList").value += dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[9].innerHTML + "|";
                }
            }
            if ((iRtnCount > 20) || (iRtnAmount > parseFloat(strLeftStageAMT))) {
                return;
            }
            if (tbSubmit != null) {
                if (parseFloat(iRtnAmount.toFixed(2)) < parseFloat(strMinStageAMT)) {
                    BtnSet.disabled = true;
                    trMsg.innerHTML = LIMIT_ERROR_MSG + strMinStageAMT + "元";
                    trMsg.style.display = "";
                    
                } else {
                    BtnSet.disabled = false;
                    trMsg.style.display = "none";
                }
            }
            if (CheckedCount != null)
                CheckedCount.innerHTML = iRtnCount;
            if (ApplyStageAMT != null)
                ApplyStageAMT.innerHTML = GetStdDispalyMoney(GetDisplayAmt(iRtnAmount.toFixed(2)));
            if (LeftStageAMT != null)
                LeftStageAMT.innerHTML = GetStdDispalyMoney(GetDisplayAmt((strLeftStageAMT - iRtnAmount).toFixed(2)));
        }

        function GetDelCheckBoxId(str, type) {
            var iCount = 0;
            var dgReckoning;
            var cbxChkAllID;
            if (type == "Unbilled") {
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount_Unbilled").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail_Unbilled");
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll_Unbilled";
            }
            else {
                iCount = document.getElementById("HidCount").value;
                dgReckoning = document.getElementById("dgReckoningNotDetail");
                cbxChkAllID = "cbxChkAll";
            }

            for (var i = 1; i <= iCount; i++) {
                var e = GetCheckBoxInElement(dgReckoning.rows[i].cells[7], cbxChkAllID);
                if (e != null && e.checked) {
                    if (e.id != str) {
                        continue;
                    } else {
                        return i;
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        function GetStdDispalyMoney(money)//金额转换成标准展示金额
        {
            money = money.toString();
            var index = money.indexOf(".");
            if (index == -1) {
                money = money + ".00";
            }
            else {
                if (index == money.length - 2)
                    money = money + "0";
            }
            return money;
        }


        //人行征信延迟倒计时
        //计时器检查
        function CheckTime(tim) {
            var leftTime = tim;
            leftTime--;
            if (leftTime <= 0) {
                //修改进度条计时时间
                try { document.getElementById("spanTimerMsg").innerHTML = "" } catch (e) { }
                try { document.getElementById("spanTimerMsg_Unbilled").innerHTML = "" } catch (e) { }
                SetStageQuota();
                body.style.cursor = "";
                return;
            }
            //修改进度条计时时间
            var timerTip = "可分期交易查询中，剩余" + leftTime + "秒，请耐心等待。";
            try { document.getElementById("spanTimerMsg").innerHTML = timerTip; } catch (e) { }
            try { document.getElementById("spanTimerMsg_Unbilled").innerHTML = timerTip; } catch (e) { }
            setTimeout("CheckTime(" + leftTime + ")", 1000);
        }

        //异步调用QueryBankCreditReckoningByStages
        function QueryBankCreditReckoningByStages() {
            var creditAccNo = document.getElementById("hdfCreditAccSelected").value;
            var functionName = document.getElementById("FunctionName").value;
            var hostPkg = new HostPkg("QueryBankCreditReckoningByStages");
            hostPkg.AddParam("ClientNo", "46DBA3B78844841A2CFE7B6A106DFED1670774231956052200003776");
            hostPkg.AddParam("FunctionName", functionName);
            hostPkg.AddParam("CreditAccNo", creditAccNo);
            hostPkg.AddParam("I_LOAN_TYPE", "002");

            var webSvrCom = new WebSvrCom("../am_AjaxHandler.aspx");
            webSvrCom.WSCSetAsync(true);
            webSvrCom.WSCClearHostPkg();
            webSvrCom.WSCAddHostPkg(hostPkg);
            webSvrCom.WSCSendRequest(QueryBankCreditReckoningByStages_CallBack);
            P.process();
        }

        //回调函数
        function QueryBankCreditReckoningByStages_CallBack(xmlHttp) {
            try {
                var xmlResponse = xmlHttp.responseText;
                var errCode = XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "ErrorCode");
                if (errCode == "000") {
                    var O_ZX_FLGA = XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "O_ZX_FLGA"); //渠道等待标志 	Y 马上发起资格查询（IN03接口返回）N 等待N秒再发起资格查询（IN03接口返回）1 马上发起资格查询（如经判定分期金额小于等于固额，无需调用资信平台）
                    var O_ZX_CODE = XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "O_ZX_CODE"); //资信平台返回码
                    var O_CASE_NO = XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "O_CASE_NO"); //调额案件号
                    var O_WAIT_TIME = XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "O_WAIT_TIME"); //O_WAIT_TIME
                    document.getElementById("O_ZX_CODE").value = O_ZX_CODE;
                    document.getElementById("O_CASE_NO").value = O_CASE_NO;
                    document.getElementById("O_WAIT_TIME").value = O_WAIT_TIME;
                    if (O_ZX_FLGA == "Y") {
                        SetStageQuota();
                    }
                    else {
                        var tim = parseInt(O_WAIT_TIME);
                        var timerTip = "可分期交易查询中，剩余" + tim + "秒，请耐心等待。";
                        try { document.getElementById("spanTimerMsg").innerHTML = timerTip; } catch (e) { }
                        try { document.getElementById("spanTimerMsg_Unbilled").innerHTML = timerTip; } catch (e) { }
                        body.style.cursor = "wait";
                        CheckTime(tim)
                    }
                }
            }
            catch (e) {

            }
            P.hideProces();
        }

        //异步调用SetStageQuota
        function SetStageQuota() {

            var creditAccNo = document.getElementById("hdfCreditAccSelected").value;
            var functionName = document.getElementById("FunctionName").value;
            var O_ZX_CODE = document.getElementById("O_ZX_CODE").value;
            var O_CASE_NO = document.getElementById("O_CASE_NO").value;
            var O_WAIT_TIME = document.getElementById("O_WAIT_TIME").value;

            var hostPkg = new HostPkg("QueryStageQuota");

            hostPkg.AddParam("ClientNo", "46DBA3B78844841A2CFE7B6A106DFED1670774231956052200003776");
            hostPkg.AddParam("FunctionName", functionName);
            hostPkg.AddParam("CreditAccNo", creditAccNo);
            hostPkg.AddParam("Currency", "156");

            hostPkg.AddParam("O_ZX_CODE", O_ZX_CODE);
            hostPkg.AddParam("O_CASE_NO", O_CASE_NO);
            hostPkg.AddParam("O_WAIT_TIME", O_WAIT_TIME);

            var webSvrCom = new WebSvrCom("../am_AjaxHandler.aspx");
            webSvrCom.WSCSetAsync(true);
            webSvrCom.WSCClearHostPkg();
            webSvrCom.WSCAddHostPkg(hostPkg);
            webSvrCom.WSCSendRequest(QueryStageQuota_CallBack);
            P.process();
        }

        //回调函数
        function QueryStageQuota_CallBack(xmlHttp)
        {
            try 
            {
                var xmlResponse = xmlHttp.responseText;
                var errCode = XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "ErrorCode");
                if (errCode == "000") 
                {
                    var sBLACK_FLAG = Trim(XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "BLACK_FLAG", ""));       //Y/N是否在2日内出账单的黑名单内。如果是则不允许交易
                    var sLOAN_AMT_MAA = Trim(XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "LOAN_AMT_MAA", ""));       //客户允许的已入账分期金额上限
                    var sLOAN_AMT_AVAIL = Trim(XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "LOAN_AMT_AVAIL", ""));   //客户允许的剩余可分期额度
                    var sLOAN_RATE = Trim(XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "LOAN_RATE", ""));                  //汇率
                    var sLOAN_RATE_DATE = Trim(XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "LOAN_RATE_DATE", ""));        //汇率日期
                    var sLOAN_INQ_DATETIME = Trim(XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "LOAN_INQ_DATETIME", ""));  //日期时间
                    var sLOAN_AMT_MIN = Trim(XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "LOAN_AMT_MIN", ""));  //分期最小金额限制
                    var sLOAN_AMT_AVAILCA = Trim(XMLGetValueByElementName(xmlResponse, "LOAN_AMT_AVAILCA", ""));   //客户允许的未入账剩余可分期额


                        try { $("#hdfMinStageAMT").val(sLOAN_AMT_MIN); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#hRate").val(sLOAN_RATE); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#hRateDate").val(sLOAN_RATE_DATE); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#hINQDateTime").val(sLOAN_INQ_DATETIME); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#lRate").html((parseFloat(sLOAN_RATE)).toFixed(4)); } catch (e) { }
                   
                        try { $("#hdfLOAN_AMT_MAA").val(sLOAN_AMT_MAA); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#HidLeftStageAMT").val(sLOAN_AMT_AVAIL); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#HidLeftStageAMT_Unbilled").val(sLOAN_AMT_AVAILCA); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#LeftStageAMT").html(sLOAN_AMT_AVAIL); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#LeftStageAMT_Unbilled").html(sLOAN_AMT_AVAILCA); } catch (e) { }

                        try { $("#ApplyStageAMT").html("0.00"); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#ApplyStageAMT_Unbilled").html("0.00"); } catch (e) { }

                        try { $("#lApplyToRMB").html("0.00"); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#CheckedCount").html("0"); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#CheckedCount_Unbilled").html("0"); } catch (e) { }


                    if (sBLACK_FLAG == "Y") {
                        try { $("#tbQueryFail").show(); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#tbSubmit").hide(); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#tbSubmit_Unbilled").hide(); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#spanByStage").html("温馨提示：账单日当天不可以进行交易分期申请"); } catch (e) { }
                        try { hideAllUseApply(); } catch (e) { }
                    }
                    else {
                        try { $("#tbQueryFail").hide(); } catch (e) { }
                        try { if ($("#HidCount").val() != "0") { $("#tbSubmit").show(); } else { $("#tbSubmit").hide(); } } catch (e) { }
                        try { if ($("#HidCount_Unbilled").val() != "0") { $("#tbSubmit_Unbilled").show(); } else { $("#tbSubmit_Unbilled").hide(); } } catch (e) { }

                    }
                    }
                    else {
                        try { $("#tbSubmit").hide(); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#tbSubmit_Unbilled").hide(); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#tbQueryFail").show(); } catch (e) { }
                        try { $("#spanByStage").html("查询交易分期额度信息失败，如想申请交易分期，请您重新进行查询"); } catch (e) { }
                        try { hideAllUseApply(); } catch (e) { }
                    }
                SetTransByStageCheckBoxAndAction();
            }
            catch (e) {
            }
            P.hideProces();
        }
        function SubmitProcess() {
            if (typeof CMBPBLS !== 'undefined'
                && typeof CMBPBLS.AddSubmitBehaviorData !== 'undefined') {
                CMBPBLS.AddSubmitBehaviorData();
            }
            return true;
        }
    </script>

        document.getElementById("BtnPrint").setAttribute("style", "display:block;");

    }
